Articles.Content:
Just wanted to introduce myself. I started playing KSP a few days ago, and recently figured out how to add new parts into the game...

My problem: Does anyone have a part to protect me from an over-heating wife? When I play this game too long, she tends to over-heat and has the potential to explode, lol. ;D

Anyway, this game is great!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
You could download the 'bunch of flowers' part from my mod pack. Actually, if you download the whole lot it includes that plus the 'I'll do it in 15 minutes' lie generator.
